title: Space Runaway Ideon Movie 2
alternative_title: Densetsu Kyojin Ideon: Hatsudou-hen, The Ideon: Be Invoked, 伝説巨神イデオン 発動篇
description: The Solo Ship and its crew continue their intense battle with the Buff Clan leading to a final battle that will determine the fate of all life in the universe.
